attributes.action: Introduce ALBANIAN language as a GCSE and A-Level
attributes.additional_details: There are many Albanian and Kosovan children in the UK that all speak the same language; "Shqip" also known simply as "Albanian". I think it necessary to introduce this language as a GCSE and possibly at A-Level, as there are many people who would do it and find it helpful to have a certificate to identify their skills in this language.
